about_the_game:
SpiderClimber is a role-playing adventure game

SpiderClimber has advanced physics engine and innovative operation. Every hill, branch and stone can bring you many challenges.

  • find your way home with just one thread.

  • looking for the meaning of life in constant failures and setbacks.

  • Lost, back again and again, this journey home seems to be painful, 60% of our testers, struggling on the ground for 30 minutes or more, 80% lost for 1 hour or more, good luck.

  • unexpected rewards are waiting for the little spider.
detailed_description:
SpiderClimber is a role-playing adventure game

SpiderClimber has advanced physics engine and innovative operation. Every hill, branch and stone can bring you many challenges.

  • find your way home with just one thread.

  • Lost, back again and again, this journey home seems to be painful, 60% of our testers, struggling on the ground for 30 minutes or more, 80% lost for 1 hour or more, good luck.

name: SpiderClimber

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The configuration that can run at least may get stuck. It is recommended to set a lower image quality
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: The little spider trapped in the online ball can't move. You will control the firefly, light up the way for the little spider, and lead the little spider home. All the way, and fell all over the body, but will cheer up, always go, always go
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
